import React from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router'; import Cookies from 'universal-cookie'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function EditQuestion () { const cookies = new Cookies(); const { id } = useParams(); const [questions, setQuestions] = React.useState(null); React.useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:5005/admin/quiz/' + id, { method: 'GET', headers: { Accept: 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', Authorization: 'Bearer ' + cookies.get('token') } }).then(data => { if (data.status === 200) { data.json().then((result) => { setQuestions(result.questions.map(question => { return ( <>

{question.description}

); })) }) } }) }, []);
